talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup_00>*yawn* <sp:5:0:0>I'm too sleepy to play now.
Is tomorrow OK?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm all right sleeping by myself, 'cause I
can find Mommy on the <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>!
near0002: I wonder if Mommy is here.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You're a voe person, just like Daddy!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Hey, guess what? <sp:5:0:0>I'm going to look at the
<clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Gotta go! <sp:5:0:0>I'll see you later! <sp:5:0:0>Sav'orq!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You're a voe person, just like Daddy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Hey, guess what? <sp:5:0:0>I'm gonna show
Mattison the <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Gotta go! <sp:5:0:0>I'll see you later!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Do you wanna see the <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>, too,
voe person?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I don't mind, but it's a <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>, so
don't tell anybody I showed you.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Do you wanna see the <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>, too,
voe person?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>It shows the <clr:0000>store<clr:ffff> where Mommy works!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Let's see. There's the <clr:0000>fruit store<clr:ffff>. And
there's the <clr:0000>jewel store<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_01>Umm? <sp:5:1:0>What was this <clr:0000>moon part<clr:ffff> again?
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Mommy's job is a <clr:0000>secret<clr:ffff>. That's why this
is a <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>!
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Aah! You're the voe I saw when
I was exploring!
talk0024: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy_01>You're a voe person, just like Daddy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm done looking at the <clr:0000>secret map <clr:ffff>now.<sp:0:4:0>But I gotta go. Kids Klub is about to start!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, I gotta go! Kids Klub is about to start!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I spent too long looking at the <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff>
and now I'm gonna be late.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup>I gotta sleep soon.<sp:0:4:0>I feel like I can hear <clr:0000>Mommy's voice <clr:ffff>when
I'm here. It makes me sleepy...
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup>I feel like I can hear <clr:0000>Mommy's voice <clr:ffff>when
I'm here. It puts me right to sleep.
talk0027:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup_00>I hope the others come soon.<sp:0:4:0>I feel like I can hear <clr:0000>Mommy's voice <clr:ffff>from here.
It makes me sleepy...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You're a voe person, just like Daddy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey, guess what? <sp:5:0:0>I'm gonna get to see
Mattison's balloon!<sp:0:4:0>Gotta go! <sp:5:0:0>See you later! Sav'orq!
talk0004: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Aaah! You're a voe, just like Daddy!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>The voe person is following me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Do you wanna see Mattison's balloon,
too, voe person?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>It's this way!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>A voe?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>I don't wanna get caught talking to people
I'm not supposed to!<sp:0:4:0>I-I gotta get back to the <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:0:0>quick!
talk0018: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>It flies in a floaty way! Isn't that neat?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>A voe?! <sp:5:0:0>Again?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Mommy would be so mad if she saw me
talking to you!<sp:0:4:0>I give up exploring. I gotta get back to the
<clr:0000>shelter <clr:ffff>already!
talk0019: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>It's yellow like the sun. So cute!
